goals.description: Transition from single year to a long-term (3 year) financial forecast while ensuring HFG realizes at least €500m of AEBIT and €400m FCF (post leases) in 2026
Improve accuracy and agility of forecasting vs. 2025 for both weekly cost reporting and monthly actuals to GCR
Overachieve >300 mEUR+ cost savings target communicated externally, including 100 mEUR+ overhead savings
Ensure >€1B spend flows through Workday Procurement to ensure proper controls

key_results.metric: AEBIT variance of MEC to GCR

in_scope: Three-year financial forecasting with adaptive budget for all markets
Achieving 2026 AEBIT and FCF targets
Efficiency Program/Cost to Serve (HFG Top 5 Strategy #5)
Stronger enforcement and team education on financial planning
Improving AEBIT cockpit and planning process with GTO
Tailored reporting of discretionary costs (personnel costs, T&E, cost centers)
Tracking and enforcement of cost saving programs
Taking over responsibility for indirect personnel cost controlling from AEBIT cockpit
Improving forecasting accuracy for weekly cost reporting and monthly actuals
Reconciliation between cockpit and P&L impact in budget/actuals
Risk mitigation activities including fraud prevention
AI/Gemini experimentation for finance processes

dependencies: Business functions driving AEBIT and FCF value
GTO collaboration for AEBIT cockpit and planning improvements
Functional leaders commitment to 3-year planning
SMT leaders steering with near and long-term vision
Tech support (noted as limited availability, focused on commercial teams)
Group CFO approval for decisions impacting targets or 3-year plan
Workday Procurement system implementation and adoption
Cross-functional collaboration for cost savings programs
Front-line teams (e.g., AP) maintaining vigilance on fraud risks

risks.risk: General business performance not meeting AEBIT and FCF targets
risks.mitigation: Finance accurately tracking performance; assist with accuracy intramonth via GCR to MEC; partner with business functions through AEBIT cockpit

risks.risk: Finance objectives not being 'top of mind' across the business
risks.mitigation: Stronger enforcement and team education; proactive collaboration and challenge through tailored reporting

risks.risk: Limited Tech support for Finance objectives (Accuracy #2 and Efficiency #3)
risks.mitigation: Accomplish objectives without substantial Tech support; leverage AI/Gemini for automation and efficiency

risks.risk: Difficulty prioritizing risk mitigation activities and maintaining vigilance on fraud threats
risks.mitigation: Ensure front-line teams 'stay frosty' to threats; focus on risk mitigation as part of objectives

risks.risk: Decisions made that impact near-term targets or 3-year plan without proper validation
risks.mitigation: Require Group CFO approval and analysis validating trade-offs for material decisions

initiatives: Implementation of 3-year adaptive budget with core metrics (AOR, CAC, conversion growth, PC2, capex) across all markets
Enhancement of AEBIT cockpit with GTO for improved planning process
Workday Procurement rollout to process >€1B spend
Cost savings program tracking and enforcement (>€300m target)
Tailored discretionary cost reporting system (personnel, T&E, cost centers, Multimarket/Nexus)
Transfer of indirect personnel cost controlling responsibility from AEBIT cockpit to Finance
Forecasting accuracy improvement program for weekly and monthly reporting
Reconciliation process between cockpit and P&L for budget/actuals

AI/Gemini experimentation projects including: podcast creation from meeting notes, large dataset reconciliation, historical GL data analysis for estimates, quick analysis on large datasets for faster book closing
Risk mitigation and fraud prevention program

goals.description: Transform HelloFresh into 'Spotify for food' - platform where any creator can share recipes

in_scope: Curated recipe creator marketplace with influencers
Aggregators integration
Instant purchase as meal kit option
Fulfilled by HelloFresh model
Recipe scoring based on formatting and completeness
Reliability meter for recipes
Automatic flagging of recipes missing critical info (times, measurements, yields)
Save for later functionality
Q&A section for recipes
deprioritized: Open platform for any creator (deferred to later phase)

dependencies: Operations and logistics infrastructure
Warehouse capabilities
User research completion (Katheryn Eckles)
Tech execution team (Wanderley Teixeira)
Design assets and prototypes (Shay Obaidullah, Marc)
Business strategy alignment (Melanie Schwindt)
Bi-weekly stakeholder approvals

risks.risk: Competitors already solving problem (Instacart partnerships with influencers and Pinterest)
risks.mitigation: Act with urgency; differentiate with holistic meal kit offering vs individual ingredients

risks.risk: Influencers dependent on heavily controlled social media platforms
risks.mitigation: Provide new revenue stream and direct audience engagement outside platforms
Implement recipe scoring system and automatic flagging of incomplete recipes

goals.description: Transform HelloFresh into the 'Spotify for food' - a platform where any creator can share a recipe that HelloFresh fulfills
Complete Prototype & Validate: MVP Blueprint phase

key_results.metric: Attract new customers through social commerce
Create new revenue streams for influencers
Convert social media recipe inspiration into shoppable meal kits
key_results.target: Easy re-cooking through meal kit delivery

in_scope: Curated recipe creator marketplace with influencers
Curated recipe creator marketplace with aggregators
Instant purchase as meal kit 'fulfilled by HelloFresh'
Recipe scoring based on clear formatting and completeness
Reliability meter for recipes
Automatic flagging of recipes missing critical info (times, measurements, yields)
Save for later functionality
Q&A section for recipes
deprioritized: Full open platform for any creator (deferred to long-term vision)

dependencies: Tech Execution team (Wanderley Teixeira)
Operation Strategy team
Warehouse and logistics infrastructure
User Research completion (Katheryn Eckles)
Design Assets from Marc and Shay Obaidullah
Stakeholder approval through bi-weekly gated decisions

risks.risk: Competitive threat from Instacart partnerships with influencers and Pinterest
risks.mitigation: Act now with urgency; differentiate with holistic meal kit offering vs individual ingredients

risks.risk: Recipe quality and completeness variability from influencers
risks.mitigation: Implement recipe scoring system and reliability meter; automatically flag incomplete recipes

risks.risk: Timing of purchase intent - users may want to buy later
risks.mitigation: Include save for later functionality in MVP consideration

initiatives: Curated marketplace with influencers and aggregators
HelloFresh shop creation for influencer recipes
